comment._content: In front of what is now called Federal Hall, 26 Wall Street, New York City. It was then the Sub-Treasury building, and was built in 1842 as the New York Customs House. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Federal_Hall

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Aloysius_O%27Gorman James Aloysius O'Gorman, Sr. (May 5, 1860 – May 17, 1943) was a one-term United States Senator from New York.
